Desc.entry: Represents tenants and residents' interests on the Badger estate and has now expanded to include Tilford Road and the Tithe Barn estate. Offers information and advice relating to housing and tenancy issues, liases with Yorkshire Metropolitan Housing regarding private housing matters. The association has a tenants and residents' office with meeting room which is used to host adult learning classes run by Woodhouse & District Community Forum (see separate entry).

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 13
